news_header: TradeTalks discusses a new report on managing complexity in the financial system and highlights the importance of strategic technology partnerships.
news_text: TradeTalks is at the Global Alts Miami conference, focusing on a new report titled 'The New Growth Imperative,' which examines the rising complexity in the financial system and suggests ways for institutions to adapt. The report indicates that while external complexity has increased significantly, internal organizational complexity has grown even more. It identifies key challenges and emphasizes the need for financial institutions to partner with technology providers to enhance risk and compliance functions, potentially realizing billions in efficiency gains. The article also touches on trends in digital assets, including regulatory changes and the growing importance of blockchain technology.
